Posts.Content: I currently have Chemo every 3 weeks and I've just finished my third session. I know everyone suffers to some extent afterwards, but I don't feel I can cope with the side effects any longer. I have an appointment with my Oncologist on 21st April and I'm seriously considering asking her if I can stop at the 3 sessions, or if she'll put me on weekly sessions, assuming, that because of the lesser dose, the side effects will be less. Has anyone else on here managed to changed the frequency of their treatment and did it help any? Thanks for reading and your comments welcomed, Jeanette X

Posts.Content: Hi, I'm due Chemo in about three weeks after a single mastectomy 2 weeks ago, and although I fear losing my hair more than my breast, I'm mentally prepared for it.
